steps.title: Prepare the Dough
instructions: In a large bowl, combine warm water, sugar, and yeast. Let sit for 10 minutes until foamy.
Add flour, olive oil, and salt. Mix until the dough just begins to come together.
Turn out the dough onto a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes.
Place the dough in a greased bowl, cover with a damp cloth, and let rise in a warm place until doubled in size, about 1 hour.

steps.title: Prepare the Toppings
instructions: Slice the mozzarella and chop the basil leaves.
Once the dough has risen, punch it down and spread it out on a pizza stone or a large baking sheet.

steps.title: Assemble and Bake
instructions: Spread a thin layer of tomato sauce over the prepared dough.
Arrange mozzarella slices evenly on top of the sauce.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Remove from the oven and immediately garnish with fresh basil and a drizzle of olive oil before serving.
